title: 3.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
In this exercise, you will need to write a program that asks the user to enter different positive numbers. After each number is entered, print out which number is the maximum and which number is the minimum of the numbers they have entered so far.
Stop asking for numbers when the user enters 0.
Sample output:
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
